remarks: Isomorphism H of a lattice glb.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Apr-2014.)
statement:
dihglb.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihglb.g $e |- G = ( glb ` K ) $.
dihglb.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihglb.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihglb $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( S C_ B /\ S =/= (/) ) ) -> ( I ` ( G ` S ) ) = |^|_ x e. S ( I ` x ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d G x $.
$d H x $.
$d I x $.
$d K x $.
$d S x $.
